component.text:
• Used for Voice communication
  • Most often used for phone lines

• Used for Data transmission
  • Cat 5 supports 100 Mbps and can support 1000 Mbps but it is not recommended
  • Cat 5e supports 1000 Mbps

• Used for Data transmission
  • An added separator is between each pair of wires allowing it to function at higher speeds
  • Supports 1000 Mbps - 10 Gbps, though 10 Gbps is not recommended

• Used for Data transmission
  • Individual pairs are wrapped in a shield and then the entire four pairs wrapped in another shield
  • Supports 1000 Mbps - 10 Gbps, though 10 Gbps is not recommended
Roll over each wire for more information.
